name: Clover Manor
description:
A Survival Horror Audio Game by Hang Ruan and Corey Bertelsen

Clover Manor is a survival horror prototype. You are being pursued by a vengeful poltergeist and need to escape the house. The game prototype requires an Oculus Rift with Touch Controllers.

You move in whatever direction you are facing by pressing the Y button on the left-hand controller. You can echo-locate in that direction by pressing the B button on the right-hand controller. Echo-location can help you get a sense of how large your space is, and doors will sound different than walls.

The music signifies that the ghost is chasing you. It will follow you into rooms if it sees you go through a door. Your only hope is to find the front door and escape!
